page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: CULVERSTONE PRIMARY SCHOOL GR 631 635. In Culverstone Primary School there are 146 pupils and 6 teatchers.The number of pupils are steadily rising. The pupils pay 2.59 pounds a week for five school meals or if they prefer they can bring their own lunch which usally consists of sandwiches,drink, chocolate biscuits and a packet of crisps.They have three breaks a day. For games they play cricket,football, netball,rounders and go swimming.The subjects they teach are Maths,English, Art,Craft,Geography and Music.
